Using mocks and patch objects from the `unittest.mock` library to simulate fcntl calls when testing system-specific functions

Writing test cases that cover common use cases, edge cases, and error handling scenarios for fcntl operations
Ensuring tests are modular, self-contained, and isolated to minimize interference between individual tests
